name: Nature Wanderer....not all those who wander are lost...:-)
description: Scenic Bohol casts a spell on visitors drawn to this oval shaped island. There are many things to admire, from the Chocolate Hills, to the Tarsier (a nocturnal primate),  from the Loboc River and its floating restaurant to Tagbilaran City itself. Add to these stunning palm fringed coastlines that are blessed with a myriad of white sand beaches and sheltering coves,  and of course, the ever smiling, ever friendly Boholano people!
